title: The Great Age of Fresco - Discoveries, Recoveries, and Survivals
description:
pdf / English / 1970 / 251 pages / 40.5 MB

Dangers from floods to air pollution threaten the great frescoes of the medieval and renaissance artists. This is a look books filled with pictures of frescoes that were stripped from the walls of Europe in order to save them. Brief descriptions with the pieces share what was learned in the removal process, along with history and technique.  LibraryThing
